price: Basi mtakase Mola wako Mlezi kwa kumhimidi, na uwe miongoni wanaomsujudia.
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: Ikikupata dhiki hiyo mkimbilie Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu umwelekee, na umt'ii na umnyenyekee, na utake msaada kwa Sala, kwani humo ndio imo poza.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
